text: Ludwig van Beethoven's Piano Sonata No. 25 in G major, Op. 79, also known as Cuckoo or Sonatina is a piece of music for solo piano. It was written in the summer of 1809 and is shorter than Beethoven's other piano sonatas. A performance of the sonata lasts nine minutes. Tovey, D.F. (1931) Commentary on Beethoven's Piano Sonatas, London, ABRSM. ==Form== The sonata is in three sections, called movements: ==References== Piano Sonata 025 Category:Compositions in G major
title: Piano Sonata No. 25 (Beethoven)
